729501f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Faber Avenue
729501f-a.text:
2180 Richmond Terrace, adjoining the S. 4.
cornes of Faber Avenue, showing the house of the
Knights of Columbus, Assumption Council 1694. In
1874 the house was located on property owned by J.
F. H. King; in 1898 it belonged to Mark Samuels;
in 1907 to Florence W. Sweet, and in 1a17 to ualter
SWWeet. Dates refer to mans u which the owners '
nuames appear.
Ju iy 2, 1932
P. L. Sperr
